name: access
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: access
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the method or possibility of getting near to a place or person
trans_examp.trans_cn: 通道；途径；（接近某地或某人的）机会（或方法）；（使用某物的）权利

example.eg: The only access to the village is by boat.
example.egtrans: 到那个村子去的唯一方法是乘船。

example.eg: The main access to (= entrance to) the building is at the side.
The children's father was refused access to them at any time (= refused official permission to see them).
example.egtrans: 孩子们的父亲任何时候都无权探视他们。

dsense.name: access
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the right or opportunity to use or look at something
trans_examp.trans_cn: 使用或看见某物的权利或机会

example.eg: The system has been designed to give the user quick and easy access to the required information.
example.egtrans: 系统旨在方便用户快速地获取所需信息。

example.eg: Hackers had/gained complete access to the company files.
example.egtrans: 黑客入侵了公司所有的文件。

name: access
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to open a computer file (= a collection of information stored on a computer) in order to look at or change information in it
